sentences.english: Could you tell us about your major, Mechanical Engineering?
sentences.chinese: 你能跟我們談談你的專業，機械工程嗎？

sentences.english: The lead author was Wonjoon Choi, a doctoral student in mechanical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 首席作者崔元俊，是機械工程專業的一名博士在讀生。

sentences.english: We is the official member of China Mechanical Engineering Associations.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是中囯機械工程學會會員。

sentences.english: Several firms of mechanical engineering have been syndicated.
sentences.chinese: 幾家機械工程公司已組成了機械工程辛迪加。

sentences.english: Several firms of mechanical engineering have been syndicated.
sentences.chinese: 幾家機械工程公司已組成了機械工程辛迪加。

sentences.english: Experience in FIEs and background in Mechanical Engineering will be advantages for this position.
sentences.chinese: 有外企工作經驗以及有機械工程類背景者優先。

sentences.english: The money that some individuals had intended to spend on mechanical engineering has been transferred to ambassadors.
sentences.chinese: 有人本來打算花在機械工程上面的錢轉移給了大使。

sentences.english: Wang is a senior mechanical engineering and automation major.
sentences.chinese: 王弘毅是就讀於機械工程與自動化專業的大四學生。

sentences.english: Assignments are project-oriented relating to mechanical engineering topics.
sentences.chinese: 作業以與機械工程主題相關之專題爲取向。

sentences.english: Okay, Mechanical Engineering is, well, it's engineering
sentences.chinese: 好。機械工程屬於工程學，

sentences.english: HG70 steel is a high strength and low carbon steel for mechanical engineering use.
sentences.chinese: HG70鋼是一種高強度低合金機械工程用鋼。

sentences.english: So course two is Mechanical Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的話，課程2就代表機械工程。

sentences.english: Being a Mechanical Engineering major, what is your favorite machinery?
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個學機械工程的人，你最喜歡的機械是什麼？

sentences.english: MSC. , Mechanics and Machine Construction, 2 or 3years.
sentences.chinese: 機械工程與製造碩土，英語授課，2或3年。
